com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface IGroupCodeService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
GroupCodeService
public interface IGroupCodeService
extends IService

The interface for the GroupCodeService class The GroupCode service class provides remote services to manipuate GroupCode records in the database.

Method Summary

Method Detail

createGroupCode

boolean createGroupCode(PCSession session,
                        java.lang.String sCodeID,
                        java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                        java.lang.String sAuthor,
                        java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                        java.util.Date dModificationDate)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a new GroupCode record, assigning a Code to a CodeGroup and returns it if successful

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sCodeID, the id of the code to add to the given CodeGroup.
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the CodeGroup the code is in.
String - sAuthor, the author of the Code to CodeGroup assignment.
java.util.Date - dCreationDate, the creation date of the new Code to CodeGroup assignment.
java.util.Date - dModificationDate, the modification date of the new Code to CodeGroup assignment.
Returns:
boolean, indicates if the new Code to CodeGroup assignment record was successfully added.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

delete

boolean delete(PCSession session,
               java.lang.String sCodeID,
               java.lang.String sCodeGroupID)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
Delete the given code, groupcode record from the database and returns it if successful

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sCodeID, the id of the code to remove from the given CodeGroup.
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the CodeGroup to remove the code from.
Returns:
boolean, indicates if the Code was removed from the CodeGroup successfully.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
